mathematical operations
[scattered data-points for interpolation (task)]


Functions

void surfit::task_transform (REAL shiftX, REAL scaleX, REAL shiftY, REAL scaleY)
 makes geometrical transform on surfit_task (shifting and scaling)
void surfit::task_inverse_transform (REAL shiftX, REAL scaleX, REAL shiftY, REAL scaleY)
 makes inverse to task_transform operation
bool surfit::task_filter_by_defarea ()
 removes all points from surfit_task for which surfit_defarea is undefined
bool surfit::task_filter_by_func (REAL eps)
 removes points from surfit_task, if , where (x,y,z) - surfit_task data points, f(x,y) - surfit_func value at point (x,y)
bool surfit::task_update_by_func ()
 set points values to z = f(x,y), where (x,y,z) - surfit_task data points, f(x,y) - surfit_func value at point (x,y)
REAL surfit::task_minx ()
 returns minimum X value of all data-points
REAL surfit::task_maxx ()
 returns maximum X value of all data-points
REAL surfit::task_miny ()
 returns minimum Y value of all data-points
REAL surfit::task_maxy ()
 returns maximum Y value of all data-points
REAL surfit::task_minz ()
 returns minimum Z value of all data-points
REAL surfit::task_maxz ()
 returns maximum Z value of all data-points
bool surfit::task_add_noise (REAL std)
 adds noise distributed as N(0,std) to surfit_task
REAL surfit::task_mean ()
 calculates mean value of all data-points in surfit_task
REAL surfit::task_std (REAL mean)
 calculates standart deviation value from mean value (for surfit_task)
bool surfit::task_plus (task *tsk)
 calculates A = A+B, where A - this class, B - another task
bool surfit::task_minus (task *tsk)
 calculates A = A-B, where A - this class, B - another task
bool surfit::task_mult (task *tsk)
 calculates A = A*B, where A - this class, B - another task
bool surfit::task_div (task *tsk)
 calculates A = A/B, where A - this class, B - another task
bool surfit::task_set (task *tsk)
 calculates A = B, where A - this class, B - another task
bool surfit::task_plus_real (REAL val)
 calculates A = A+B, where A - this class, B - some numeric
bool surfit::task_minus_real (REAL val)
 calculates A = A-B, where A - this class, B - some numeric
bool surfit::task_mult_real (REAL val)
 calculates A = A*B, where A - this class, B - some numeric
bool surfit::task_div_real (REAL val)
 calculates A = A/B, where A - this class, B - some numeric
bool surfit::task_set_real (REAL val)
 calculates A = B, where A - this class, B - some numeric
